dialogue.text: Ohmigosh, I can't get enough of Spicy! She's just so cute!
I love her outfit and hair! And the way she talks and moves around is adorable too.
…pfft.
I wish we were in Togarashi Town when she performed with Sweet and Sour so I could see her do her thing in person. Her guitar skills just NEED to be witnessed.
…heh heh heh.
Is something funny, Syn?
Ahaha, don't mind me. I just came to a crazy realization.
Oh? Do tell.
So… I was wondering why Spicy looked so familiar. I could've sworn I saw her face several times around a year ago. And then it hit me!
Look! There she is on “STREET MUSICIAN FAILS! ENZYNC CITY CRINGE COMPILATION” Episode 35!
…and episode 38… and episode 46… and episodes 51 through 57.
W-what? That sounds awful!
I know! She DID sound awful! I didn't know a guitar could sound THAT off key.
No, not that! Having people publicizing your worst moments like that is just awful!
She could've just been practicing. Good musicians aren't just born amazing at what they do.
Well… yeah… though why would you practice out in the streets like that? You're basically asking for attention, especially if metal is the genre you're looking to pursue.
Though it's been over a year since she last appeared in one of those videos. Something had to have happened between then and now that made her go from that to her crazy skills now.
Maybe that new guy she performs with has something to do with it…
Crazy what getting a boyfriend will do for your motivation.
Boyfriend? She's just gone on record to say they're not dating. They're just a rockin' duo.
I'm hoping nothing but the best for her, and that people look at where she started as a sign of how far she's come, and not as a way to put her down.
